config.name: connection.autoReconnectOnError
config.description: A boolean value indicating whether management server automatically starts a reconnect if a host ping command fails

config.name: load.parallelismDegree
config.description: The max hosts management server connects in parallel, when management server boots up or takes over another dead management server's hosts. It only effects when 'load.simultaneous' set to false.

config.name: ping.parallelismDegree
config.description: The max hosts management server sends ping command to host in parallel

config.name: ping.interval
config.description: The interval management server sends ping command to host, in seconds

config.name: reconnectAllOnBoot
config.description: Whether to reconnect all hosts when the management node starts
